reviews.review:
This game is the definition of LEGACY SYSTEM. (that just refuses to die)

I was playing CS before many of the current gamers were born. And the game has not changed except for slightly better visuals. Every other system has remained mostly unchanged for a long time.

The gun hit patterns that give "high skill ceiling" are just something that was put in to make it harder to use aimbots, because you couldn't consistently hit where the crosshair was. AWP used shoot through multiple walls, guess what happened? - Yes, cheating. Solution: nothing has much of penetration.

Everything in the game is 15y+ old design and the server side is pretty much just as old and flaky single threaded program that actually tends to run better on old hardware...

Yes, it's the top esports game. It's like 100m  track race, easy to understand for anyone. And people have been doing it for a long time. This does not mean it's the most fun thing to do.

The game design is just like any tower defense game. Few fixed paths between spawn zones with little variation. All variety comes from randomness in gun patterns, server glitches and player mistakes. Yes, you can make advanced team tactics, but in reality there is VERY shallow variety in tactics available. (Just note that someone inventing a new place to throw a smoke or flashbang once a year is considered a HALLELUJAH! moment for the whole game)

You really should know this game. Try it. And then avoid it and play something else.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive – это многопользовательский онлайн-шутер от первого лица. Дата выхода КС ГО – август 2012 года. Прошло уже более четырёх лет, но игра остаётся популярной и сегодня: различные турниры и соревнования собирают многомиллионную аудиторию из разных стран

I bought this game in 2018, some of the changes made to the game initially seem like bad ideas *such as the buy menu* but once you start to play with it it becomes normal again. Pretty epic game, I would download the game again and I would pay £15 again for the game like i did back in 2018. Try this game if you haven't before :D
